Google Inc. has many different businesses and the issue that we have been getting into is there's too many ways( in) which these businesses can be slowed down, Eric Schmidt said. Eric Schmidt , who became CEO in 2001 to bring more management experience to a then-fledgling company, will assume the role of executive chairman, focusing on deals and government outreach, among other things

Jane Lynch explained: People have asked me, ''What about having Sue on The X Factor? How would she do?' I think she'd be fantastic- and there would be a few contestants reduced to tears. ''It can never happen, though. Simon Cowell and Sue on the same judging panel will never work in a million years- there's only room for one ego on the show!'''

Mike D'Antoni said he stayed up late Thursday to watch Stoudemire on the Late Show with David Letterman , where the all-star told the host that the players do in fact listen to the coach. He doesn't listen to me, Mike D'Antoni said with a laugh. ''He was nice, though, very diplomatic.'' stoked resentment in Berlin and Paris. It was meant to point out that there was broad support in Eastern Europe and that France and Germany did not speak for the entire continent. Ironically, my comment was unintentional, Donald Rumsfeld writes. ''I had meant to say France and Germany represented ''old NATO' not` old Europe'.'' ''In any event, the phrase` old Europe'' entered the vernacular. The

Donald Rumsfeld 's retrospective reinforces earlier accounts of a dysfunctional National Security Council riven by tensions between the Pentagon and State Department. Addressing charges that he failed to provide enough troops in Iraq, he allows that, In retrospect, there may have been times when more troops could have helped. But he insists senior military officers never informed him if they had reservations about the size of the invading force.

Bill Lockyer , California's state treasurer, participated in a national telephonic news conference with EPI officials, to denounce the bankruptcy concept. No state needs to declare bankruptcy, Bill Lockyer said, ''The states have sovereign taxing power the big companies don't.'' Bill Lockyer 's point- a valid one- is that bankruptcy is the refuge for individuals, corporations and local governments

former Dick Armey Jim Ryun , R-Kansas, offered his help in collecting signatures from conservatives and tea party activists to encourage Mike Pence to get into the race. Mike Pence thanked those who had encouraged him, but added: While we may have been able to seek the presidency, we believe our best opportunity to continue to serve the conservative values that brought us to public life is right here in Indiana. But it would have been an uphill climb. No sitting member of the House of Representatives has won the presidency since James Garfield in 1880. And he's been mired in the bottom of polls
